answers.answer: Thanks for using the forum.The BG level of 129 is probably related to your breakfast. Atenolol does sometimes affect blood glucose, but in those cases it leads to low blood sugar by inhibiting the liver from breaking down stored glucose.I hope that this helps.Cathy

question: My BG reading last night was 80 (usually 80-100). This morning I took one atenolol (12mg) at 7am and had breakfast. Took my BG test and it shot up to 129. I feel fatigued but that may just be anxiety. Can atenolol raise you BG levels?
title: T2 Diabetes / atenolo connection?
